name: Dream Hero
description:
The game "ends" once you beat the 5th dream cycle, but you can keep going if you'd like. Things might get really hard or really easy, I haven't tested.

This game was made for the 2nd annual hexcode showdown game jam. It was made by Anthony Lawn and Haley Paty.

The game uses Vue for rendering and break_eternity.js for convenient math functions (and a much higher number limit, although the game doesn't take advantage of that).

If you're having display issues, you can also play at https://thepaperpilot.org/dream
